channel.title: Changing the ip on a client
channel.description: Where can I change the ip on a client? I have to do that so people can play on my server correct?

item.title: Changing the ip on a client
item.dc:creator: @GnarlyUnicorn GnarlyUnicorn
item.description:
@GnarlyUnicorn wrote:

Do I need to change anything on the Server like if it says Testscape has connected to 0.0.0.0:43594?

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the ip on a client

item.title: Changing the ip on a client
item.dc:creator: @DeathSlay DeathSlay
item.description:
@DeathSlay wrote:

gui.java scroll down a little till u see 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 then change to your ip

or do

cnrtl + f And type in Serverip
should get sumthing like this

Serverip = "127.0.0.1";

change that to your server ip
ex.

Serverip = "example.no-ip.biz";

save, close window, compile, run client

tada!

edit: dont double post
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,452254.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the ip on a client
item.dc:creator: @Jingojohn Jingojohn
item.description:
@Jingojohn wrote:

[quote=“dragonman2, post:2, topic:355494”]qui equi and sometimes client.java complier run there yeah go :)[/quote] That hardly helps at all…

Go into either GUI.java, or client.java and search for “setserver”.
When you find it, replace the server IP that is in the quotes with localhost if you are testing it, or your hosted server IP if you are putting it online.

Read full topic
